about_me:
Dynamic and results-driven Kotlin Multiplatform and Android Engineer with over eleven years
of experience, transitioning from freelancing to impactful startup roles and now evolving into a
visionary product owner and founder. Spearheaded impactful projects like Safe2Marry and Actionz,
leveraging expertise in Kotlin Multiplatform, Flutter, and AI/ML integration to deliver scalable,
user-centric solutions. Adept at building cross-platform apps with robust monetization, real-time
analytics, and secure authentication, with a passion for creating products that empower users and
foster growth.
